title: Moltbook AI forum explained: How bots talk to each other and why tech is divided
description: (Photo Credit : Bloomberg) 1 / 10 Bot Townhall: Moltbook is an online forum built for AI agents to post, reply and interact in topic threads, with humans limited to observing activity. The setup resembles a social network, but participation is reserved for software systems acting as users. The project has drawn attention across technology [...]
